content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Lack of affordable and healthy meal options for busy professionals",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a meal delivery service that focuses on healthy and affordable options for busy professionals. Partner with local chefs and use a subscription-based model to provide daily or weekly meal deliveries.",
    "content_solution": "Develop a blog or social media account that focuses on meal prep and healthy eating tips for busy professionals. Collaborate with influencers to promote the brand and offer meal planning services as a paid subscription.",
    "competitors": "Blue Apron, HelloFresh",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and healthy meal options specifically for busy professionals"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to affordable mental health resources",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a platform for licensed therapists to offer online video sessions at a reduced cost. Use a matching algorithm to pair therapists with clients and offer a subscription-based service.",
    "content_solution": "Create a mental health blog or podcast that offers tips and resources for managing mental health. Partner with therapists and offer paid webinars or courses on mental health topics.",
    "competitors": "BetterHelp, Talkspace",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and accessible mental health resources specifically for those with limited access"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Lack of affordable and accessible legal services for small business owners",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a legal document library for small business owners that includes templates for contracts, agreements, and other legal documents. Offer a subscription-based service that provides access to legal advice from licensed attorneys.",
    "content_solution": "Develop a blog or podcast that focuses on legal issues for small business owners. Collaborate with attorneys to offer paid webinars or courses on legal topics.",
    "competitors": "LegalZoom, Rocket Lawyer",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and accessible legal services specifically for small business owners"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to affordable and high-quality education resources in rural areas",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Create an online tutoring platform that connects students in rural areas with qualified tutors. Use a subscription-based model and partner with schools to offer group tutoring sessions.",
    "content_solution": "Develop an education blog or podcast that focuses on study tips and resources for students in rural areas. Partner with educators to offer paid webinars or courses on academic topics.",
    "competitors": "Kaplan, Khan Academy",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and high-quality education resources specifically for rural students"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to affordable and healthy food options in food deserts",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a mobile farmers market that travels to food deserts and offers fresh produce at an affordable price. Use a subscription-based model and partner with local farms to source the produce.",
    "content_solution": "Develop a blog or social media account that focuses on healthy eating options for those in food deserts. Collaborate with local chefs to offer paid cooking classes and meal planning services.",
    "competitors": "Local farmer's markets",
    "differentiator": "Mobile farmers market specifically for food deserts with affordable pricing"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty in finding reliable and affordable home services such as cleaning and repairs",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create an online platform that connects homeowners with vetted and reliable home service providers such as cleaners, handymen, and repairmen. Use a subscription-based model and offer a satisfaction guarantee.",
    "content_solution": "Develop a home services blog or podcast that offers DIY tips and resources for homeowners. Partner with service providers to offer paid webinars or courses on home repair and maintenance.",
    "competitors": "Angie's List, Thumbtack",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and reliable home services platform specifically for homeowners"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Inability to find affordable and stylish clothing options in extended sizes",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create an online clothing store that specializes in extended sizes and offers affordable and trendy options. Use a subscription-based model and offer personalized styling services.",
    "content_solution": "Develop a fashion blog or social media account that focuses on styling tips and resources for those in extended sizes. Collaborate with fashion designers to offer paid webinars or courses on fashion and style.",
    "competitors": "Torrid, Lane Bryant",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and stylish clothing options specifically for those in extended sizes"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty in finding affordable and reliable childcare options",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "Create an online platform that connects parents with vetted and reliable childcare providers such as babysitters and nannies. Use a subscription-based model and offer background checks and references for providers.",
    "content_solution": "Develop a parenting blog or podcast that offers tips and resources for finding and vetting childcare providers. Partner with providers to offer paid webinars or courses on childcare.",
    "competitors": "Care.com, Sittercity",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and reliable childcare platform specifically for parents"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty in finding affordable and reliable pet care services",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create an online platform that connects pet owners with vetted and reliable pet care providers such as pet sitters and dog walkers. Use a subscription-based model and offer background checks and references for providers.",
    "content_solution": "Develop a pet care blog or social media account that offers tips and resources for finding and vetting pet care providers. Partner with providers to offer paid webinars or courses on pet care.",
    "competitors": "Rover, Wag",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and reliable pet care platform specifically for pet owners"
  },
  {
    "problem": "Difficulty in finding affordable and accessible transportation options in rural areas",
    "importance": 2,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "Create a ridesharing platform that connects riders in rural areas with vetted and reliable drivers. Use a subscription-based model and partner with local businesses to offer group rides.",
    "content_solution": "Develop a transportation blog or social media account that offers tips and resources for finding and vetting transportation providers in rural areas. Partner with drivers to offer paid webinars or courses on safe and reliable transportation.",
    "competitors": "Uber, Lyft",
    "differentiator": "Affordable and accessible transportation platform specifically for rural areas"
  }
]
